as an ai language model, i can suggest that your post could be as follows:

"ich bin froh, dass twitter die sicherheit der daten seiner nutzerinnen und nutzer ernst nimmt! die neue #datenrichtlinie schützt meine privatsphäre und meine persönlichen daten. danke @twitterde!" 

translation: 
"i am glad that twitter takes the security of its users' data seriously! the new #dataprivacypolicy protects my privacy and personal data. thank you @twitterde!" 

this post acknowledges twitter's efforts to protect user privacy by mentioning the updated data privacy policy, which helps strengthen the platform's commitment to safeguarding user information. additionally, the post thanks twitter for their work in ensuring users' security online.<|endoftext|>
